Package org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles

Class AbstractPointStyleShapeDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles.ShapeDrawer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles.AbstractPointStyleShapeDrawer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PointStyleCircle, PointStyleCross, PointStyleDash, PointStyleLine, PointStyleRectRot, PointStyleRectRounded, PointStyleStar, PointStyleTriangle
    abstract class AbstractPointStyleShapeDrawer
extends ShapeDrawer
    Implements a shape drawer in order to use PointStyle as shape for tiles.
    Extends the usage of shape drawer for draw point styles for HtmlLegend plugin.
    Implements the drawing of point styles using CHART.JS starting point.
    See here, at method drawPoint.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

        Description copied from class: ShapeDrawer
        Draws the tile applying the requested shape.
        Specified by:
        drawTile in class ShapeDrawer
        Parameters:
        context - context of canvas to design the shape
        backgroundColor - background of tile
        shapeColor - color of shape
        size - the size of tile, which is a square

      • drawTile

        final String drawTile​(Canvas outerCanvas,
                      HtmlLegendItem htmlLegendItem)
        Draws the point style for HtmlLegend plugin.
        Parameters:
        outerCanvas - canvas reference of tiles factory.
        htmlLegendItem - legend item with all attributes to draw the canvas
        Returns:
        a data URL for the current content of the canvas element

      • drawPointStyle

        protected abstract void drawPointStyle​(Context2dItem context,
                                       int size,
                                       double x,
                                       double y,
                                       double radius,
                                       double rotation,
                                       double rad)
        Draws the tile using the point style applying the requested shape.
        Parameters:
        context - context of canvas to design the shape
        size - the size of tile, which is a square
        x - x point center of canvas
        y - y point center of canvas
        radius - the radius of the tile, only for PointStyle drawing
        rotation - the rotation (in degrees) to create the tile, only for PointStyle drawing
        rad - rad calculates on rotation

      • applyStrokeProperties

        private void applyStrokeProperties​(Context2dItem context,
                                   int size,
                                   LegendItem legendItem)
        Applies the common configuration to context for stroke designing, by a LegendItem.
        Used only for PointStyle drawing.
        Parameters:
        context - context of canvas to design the shape
        size - the size of tile, which is a square
        legendItem - the legend item instance to create the tile

        Used only for PointStyle drawing.
